markdown.markdown: I am an Assistant Professor of Computer Science at [ÉTS Montréal](https://www.etsmtl.ca/) in the [Software and Information Technology Engineering Department](https://www.etsmtl.ca/ets/gouvernance/decanats-et-departements/departement-genie-logiciel-ti). I lead the Trustworthy Information Systems Lab ([TISL](https://tisl-lab.github.io/)). My research areas of interests are computer security, data privacy, optimization, and machine learning. My current research focuses on several aspects of trustworthy machine learning, such as fairness, privacy-preserving machine learning, and explainability. Before my current position, I was a postdoctoral researcher at [UQAM](https://uqam.ca/), working on machine learning ethics and privacy. I earned my Ph.D. in Computer Science at [Université Paul-Sabatier](https://www.univ-tlse3.fr/). ## Affiliations - Assistant professor @ [ÉTS Montréal](https://www.etsmtl.ca/) - Member @ [LASI](https://www.etsmtl.ca/en/labs/lasi/team) - Associate Academic Member @ [Mila - Québec Artificial Intelligence Institute](https://mila.quebec/en/) - Member @ [SEMLA](https://semla.quebec/en/) - Regular Member @ [OBVIA](https://observatoire-ia.ulaval.ca/en/) ## Teaching - Summer 2023: [Data Privacy](https://www.etsmtl.ca/etudes/cours/GTI720) - Winter 2023: [Computer Security](https://www.etsmtl.ca/Etudes/Cours/GTI619) - Fall 2022: [Data Privacy](https://www.etsmtl.ca/etudes/cours/GTI720) - Winter 2022: [Computer Security](https://www.etsmtl.ca/Etudes/Cours/GTI619) ## Services - Area Chair - FAccT: 23 - Reviewer - ICML: 21-23 - NeurIPS: 21-23 - ICLR: 22-23 - Canadian: AI 22-23 - TMLR: 22 - IEEE Software: 19-23 ## Contact [ulrich.aivodji@etsmtl.ca](mailto:ulrich.aivodji@etsmtl.ca) (514) 396-8800 ext 8664 1100 Rue Notre Dame O, Montréal, QC H3C 1K3 Office: A-2734
